'''13w05b''' is the eighth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.5]], released on February 1, 2013<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20130205064007/http://www.mojang.com/2013/02/minecraft-snapshot-13w05b/|title=Minecraft Snapshot 13w05b|website=Mojang.com}}</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[13w05a]] snapshot.

== Fixes ==

|8444|[[Dispenser]] does not [[bonemeal]] [[grass block]]s
